Description.Text:
Position The modern building of the Grand Hotel "Yachting Palace" is located on the seaside of the typical maritime village of Marina di Riposto, near Mount Etna.
Restaurant The hotel has two restaurants, the fine dining restaurant "Il Transatlantico" and the roof garden "Flying Bridge" located on the top floor of the structure.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations In the attached building of the hotel there are functional meeting rooms and the bar. The hotel also offers a large swimming pool with Jacuzzi. Check in from 12:30.
